local posx = 0
local posy = 0
local angle = 0
function rot(px,py,a)
 local ca=cos(a)
 local sa=sin(a)
 return ca*px-sa*py,ca*py+sa*px
end
function update()
  if btn(0) then
    posx = posx - 0.05
  end
  if btn(1) then
    posx = posx + 0.05
  end
  if btn(2) then
    posy = posy + 0.05
  end
  if btn(3) then
    posy = posy - 0.05
  end
  if btnp(4) then
    angle = angle - 0.2
  end
  if btnp(5) then
    angle = angle + 0.2
  end
  local s=0.1
  local rlx,rly=rot(s,0,angle)
  line(posx-rlx,posy-rly,posx+rlx,posy+rly,1)
  line(posx-rly,posy+rlx,posx+rly,posy-rlx,1)
end
